data.name: Last Of Ark: Prologue
data.detailed_description:
This is full game!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1842640/

ABOUT

A roguelike deckbuilding tactics game that combines elements from 'Monster Train' and 'Into the Breach'.The player needs to establish organization in a destroyed world, defend against enemy attacks, and restore order.

FEATURES

  • Deck Build
With hundreds of different cards and multi-dimensional game mechanics, you will have a different experience every time you play.

  • Sacrifice Summon
Create powerful units with a Sacrifice Summon , the combination of different squads can produce unexpected reactions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7 64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
